attributes.review: So I was walking home and all of a sudden the app JUMPED out of my phone ran to my house, and ROBBED ME!!! I have never been so angry in my life. Unless you want to get Robbed, I suggest you neeeevveerrrtr get this terrible app!!!! Donald Trump, you have all this money, but can’t even make a decent app!!!
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review: I HATE this app with a passion. THE WORST APP ON THE APP STORE. It took almost 23 weeks for it to download on my phone and THEN had the audacity to wipe my entire camera roll and all of my apps off of my phone just to have this app on there. Never get this app, it is unbelievably bad just like Trump’s toupee 🤧
attributes.title: THE WORST 🤮🤮

attributes.review: I am a very big trump supporter and I really thought that this app is safe but The app hasn’t even fully downloaded and I already got hacked😤😤😤I strongly recommend to not download the app‼️‼️‼️This really made me change my mind about our so called “present”😡
attributes.title: GOT HACKED

attributes.review: Horrible app. Downloaded it and it sent graphic photos of trump’s n*des. I didn’t realize how much worse it got. Every time I tried getting out of the app, “make America great again” popped up on my scream. This non homophobic, non sexist, non racist President did a HORRENDOUS job with this app. 0/10 💀🤮
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: This app was the absolute worst app available. So bad that it makes all of the other apps look like the correct apps for the job. Which is really saying something. Because the other apps aren’t that great either.
attributes.title: Worst App

attributes.review: when i downloaded the app it made my phone glitch so many times. i never received and new information. it was just the absolute worst. i don’t recommend getting this app!! it’s absolutely atrocious. save ur time and don’t get it.
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP🤢🤢

attributes.review: Horrible app. I was extremely disappointed with the graphics, content, and overall ugliness of the app. Whoever wasted their time creating this app, I feel sorry for you. Nice try 🧚‍♂️✨don’t do it again
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: This app is so terrible as soon as I download it my whole family started saying coronavirus is a news scandal for the upcoming election. And it also lit my entire bookshelf on fire. Worst of all it keeps deleting my other apps like TikTok and CNN.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way that a bee should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. The bee, of course, flies anyways. Because bees don't care what humans think is impossible.”
attributes.title: I don’t recommend

attributes.review: No, just no don’t install this app!!! Why did it take 2 days to install and the graphics are absolutely terrible. Do yourself a favor and don’t waste your time in this.❤️
attributes.title: If I could give a zero I would
